node.title: Pakistan achieve Twenty20 milestone with victory over West Indies
node.description: The result provided a record 18th international win for 2021.
node.content: ["Pakistan have become the first men's team to win 18 Twenty20 international matches in a calendar year, beating West Indies by 63 runs in the first game of their three-match series.", "Mohammad Rizwan (78) and Haider Ali (68) put on a dominant batting performance, as Pakistan set the tourists a target of 201 at Karachi.", "The bowlers finished the job for the home team, after Mohammad Wasim picked up four wickets and Shadab Khan took three, as West Indies were skittled out for 137.", "Pakistan's 18th T20 win in 2021 was an improvement on their record of 17 victories in 2018.", "The second and third matches in the series will be played on Wednesday and Friday (NZ time) respectively.", "The teams are scheduled to play three one-day internationals after the T20 series.", "Reuters"]
